item.title: Breaking Synchronous Dependencies
item.description: A common challenge in software development is how to decide and then fulfill non-functional requirements, such as the maximum response times of your API. Two metrics to consider is the average response time of a certain endpoint, as well as the percentage of outlier requests that will fall outside of the accepted time bounds. Such outliers will always be there, especially when designing a microservice architecture using lambdas with their dreaded cold starts which is common these days.
